hero.description: Full-cycle industrial design studio. We create products that combine aesthetics, engineering precision, and manufacturable implementation. We work systematically: design → engineering → prototype → production → packaging → brand system. Our approach is based on transparency, accuracy, and responsibility for the result.

brandbook.title: Brandbook Development
brandbook.subtitle: Comprehensive brand identity systems that create memorable and consistent brand experiences across all touchpoints.

intro.title: Brandbook is the Foundation of Your Brand
intro.description: A brandbook is not just a set of rules, but the foundation on which the entire company's image rests. I approach its creation as carefully as I do any product: I study the brand's character, its audience, its purpose. On this foundation of meanings, I build a system—from color and typography to the logic of presenting materials.
intro.description2: We develop brandbooks for companies of any scale. Want a cohesive visual system with well-thought-out elements? We'll make sure it becomes your powerful tool, not just a pretty folder 'for show'.

process.title: Our Brandbook Process
process.subtitle: Structured approach to brand identity development

benefits.title: Why Invest in Brandbook?
benefits.subtitle: Key benefits of comprehensive brand guidelines

consistency.title: Brand Consistency
consistency.description: Maintain consistent visual identity across all platforms and touchpoints

efficiency.title: Team Efficiency
efficiency.description: Clear guidelines speed up design processes and decision making

recognition.title: Brand Recognition
recognition.description: Strong visual identity increases brand recall and customer loyalty

scalability.title: Easy Scalability
scalability.description: Simplifies brand expansion to new markets and product lines

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Full-cycle industrial design, engineering and manufacturing

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: Founded in 2012, NBGROUP.TECH began as a small industrial design studio with a big vision.
story.p2: Over the years, we've grown into a full-service product development company.

services.title: What We Do
services.subtitle: Systematic approach to product development

systemApproach.title: Systematic Approach
systemApproach.description: We build the process so that each stage — from idea to serial product — is logical, controllable, and predictable.
systemApproach.benefits: This reduces production risks, shortens product time-to-market, and ensures stable results.

deepAnalysis.title: Deep Analysis Before Start
deepAnalysis.description: Before development, we study the niche, audience, and production capabilities.
deepAnalysis.benefits: This helps avoid mistakes, optimize costs, and create a product that will find its audience.

honestExpertise.title: Honest Expertise
honestExpertise.description: We speak directly: what works, what doesn't, and where the solution will bring benefits.
honestExpertise.benefits: This approach saves months of work and budget, directing the project in the right direction from the first step.

industrialDesign.title: Industrial Design
industrialDesign.description: We develop product designs of any complexity - from idea to production launch.
industrialDesign.details: Every element is developed considering aesthetics, ergonomics and real production processes.

engineering.title: Engineering
engineering.description: We transform design into fully functional construction.
engineering.details1: We create precise 3D models, technical documentation, select materials and processing methods.
engineering.details2: NB GROUP TECH engineers are practitioners with real production experience.

production.title: Production
production.description: Our own production base is the key advantage of the studio.
production.materials: We work with metal, plastic, composites and other industrial materials.

brandbook.title: Brandbook
brandbook.description: We develop brand systems for companies that need to look cohesive and competitive at the international level.
brandbook.details: The NB GROUP TECH brandbook enhances the product and forms a unified visual language for the company.

identity.title: Identity Development
identity.description: We create visual systems that increase brand recognition and strengthen its reputation.
identity.details: Identity works equally accurately on packaging, website, social media and the product itself.

services.massProduction: Launch mass production of any volume

timeline.question: What's your typical project timeline?
timeline.answer: Most projects take 3-6 months from concept to production-ready design, depending on complexity and requirements.

startups.question: Do you work with startups?
startups.answer: Yes, we offer flexible engagement models for startups and established companies, including equity-based partnerships.

process.question: What's your design process?
process.answer: We follow a user-centered design process: research, strategy, concept development, prototyping, testing, and final production.
